title: Seminar Design for Improving Language Expression and Reading Comprehension Skills Using Online Knowledge Communities (OKC)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational grammar/vocabulary comprehension and intermediate-level reading/writing application skills
context.additional_context: A language education seminar in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, applying blended learning (formal seminars: grammar/writing lectures / informal OKCs: discussions/feedback) and Social Learning Analytics (SLA). Focuses on improving learners’ expressive and reading comprehension skills.

learning_goals: Learners effectively search for and utilize language learning materials (texts, vocabulary, grammar examples) in an online knowledge community (OKC).
Learners analyze interaction patterns (reading/writing feedback, expression methods) within an OKC using social learning analytics (SLA) tools and develop personalized learning strategies.

Learners comprehensively enhance language proficiency (expression and reading comprehension) by linking formal seminars (grammar/writing lectures) with informal OKC activities (discussions/feedback) in blended learning environments.

resources: Smartphone-Compatible OKC Platform (Naver Cafe, Discord, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
